problem.markdown:
1. A potential transformer is a
() None () Step up transformer (x) Step down transformer () Both Step up transformer and Step down transformer
2. Oil transformer usually consist of,
() Breather of dehydrating type () Winding temperature-indicator, oil temperature indicator () A conservator tank, buchholz relay (x) All
3. In case of, OFF circuit taps, the transformer must be _________ before the tap changer mechanism is operated.
(x) De-energized () Energized () Both Energized and De-energized
4. Current ratios are in _________ of the voltage ratio.
(x) Inverse ratio () Direct ratio
5. _________ is used to make sure that an electrical circuit can be completely de-energized for service or maintenance.
() Circuit breaker (x) Isolator () Fuse () None

choicegroup.choice: Both Step up transformer and Step down transformer

problem.p: 3. In case of, OFF circuit taps, the transformer must be _________ before the tap changer mechanism is operated.
4. Current ratios are in _________ of the voltage ratio.
5. _________ is used to make sure that an electrical circuit can be completely de-energized for service or maintenance.
